00019 #include "fsal_internal.h"
00020 #include "fsal_convert.h"

00024 
00059 fsal_status_t FSAL_rename(
00060     fsal_handle_t         * p_old_parentdir_handle,      /* IN */
00061     fsal_name_t           * p_old_name,                /* IN */
00062     fsal_handle_t         * p_new_parentdir_handle,      /* IN */
00063     fsal_name_t           * p_new_name,                /* IN */
00064     fsal_op_context_t     * p_context,                      /* IN */
00065     fsal_attrib_list_t    * p_src_dir_attributes,        /* [ IN/OUT ] */
00066     fsal_attrib_list_t    * p_tgt_dir_attributes         /* [ IN/OUT ] */
00067 ){
00068   
00069   int                     rc, errsv;
00070   fsal_status_t           status;
00071   fsal_posixdb_status_t   statusdb;
00072   struct stat             old_parent_buffstat, new_parent_buffstat, buffstat;
00073   fsal_path_t             old_fsalpath, new_fsalpath;
00074   fsal_posixdb_fileinfo_t info;
00075   
00076   /* sanity checks.
00077    * note : src/tgt_dir_attributes are optional.
00078    */
00079   if ( !p_old_parentdir_handle ||
00080        !p_new_parentdir_handle ||
00081        !p_old_name ||
00082        !p_new_name ||
00083        !p_context )
00084     Return(ERR_FSAL_FAULT ,0 , INDEX_FSAL_rename);
00085   
00086 
00087   /**************************************
00088    * Build the old path and the new one *
00089    **************************************/
00090   status = fsal_internal_getPathFromHandle(p_context, p_old_parentdir_handle, 1, &old_fsalpath, &old_parent_buffstat);
00091   if (FSAL_IS_ERROR(status)) Return(status.major, status.minor, INDEX_FSAL_rename);
00092   
00093   /* optimisation : don't do the work two times if source dir = dest dir  */
00094   if (! FSAL_handlecmp( p_old_parentdir_handle, p_new_parentdir_handle, &status )) {
00095     FSAL_pathcpy(&new_fsalpath, &old_fsalpath);
00096     new_parent_buffstat = old_parent_buffstat;
00097   } else {
00098     status = fsal_internal_getPathFromHandle(p_context, p_new_parentdir_handle, 1, &new_fsalpath, &new_parent_buffstat);
00099     if (FSAL_IS_ERROR(status)) Return(status.major, status.minor, INDEX_FSAL_rename);
00100   }
00101 
00102   status = fsal_internal_appendFSALNameToFSALPath(&old_fsalpath, p_old_name);
00103   if (FSAL_IS_ERROR(status)) Return(status.major, status.minor, INDEX_FSAL_mkdir);
00104   status = fsal_internal_appendFSALNameToFSALPath(&new_fsalpath, p_new_name);
00105   if (FSAL_IS_ERROR(status)) Return(status.major, status.minor, INDEX_FSAL_mkdir);
00106  
00107   TakeTokenFSCall();
00108   rc = lstat( old_fsalpath.path, &buffstat ); 
00109   errsv = errno;
00110   ReleaseTokenFSCall();
00111   if (rc) Return( posix2fsal_error(errsv), errsv, INDEX_FSAL_rename );
00112 
00113   if (FSAL_IS_ERROR( status = fsal_internal_posix2posixdb_fileinfo(&buffstat, &info) ) )
00114     Return( status.major, status.minor, INDEX_FSAL_rename );
00115 
00116   /********************
00117    * Check credential *
00118    ********************/
00119 
00120   if ( FSAL_IS_ERROR( status = fsal_internal_testAccess( p_context, FSAL_W_OK | FSAL_X_OK, &old_parent_buffstat, NULL) ) )
00121     Return(status.major, status.minor, INDEX_FSAL_rename);
00122 
00123   if ( FSAL_IS_ERROR( status = fsal_internal_testAccess( p_context, FSAL_W_OK | FSAL_X_OK, &new_parent_buffstat, NULL) ) )
00124     Return(status.major, status.minor, INDEX_FSAL_rename);
00125 
00126   /* Check sticky bit on directories */
00127 
00128   if ( (old_parent_buffstat.st_mode & S_ISVTX) /* Sticky bit on the directory => the user who wants to delete the file must own it or its parent dir */
00129        && old_parent_buffstat.st_uid != p_context->credential.user 
00130        && buffstat.st_uid != p_context->credential.user 
00131        && p_context->credential.user != 0 )
00132     Return(ERR_FSAL_ACCESS, 0, INDEX_FSAL_rename);
00133   
00134   if ( new_parent_buffstat.st_mode & S_ISVTX) { /* Sticky bit on the directory => the user who wants to delete the file must own it or its parent dir */
00135     TakeTokenFSCall();
00136     rc = lstat( new_fsalpath.path, &buffstat ); 
00137     errsv = errno;
00138     ReleaseTokenFSCall();
00139     if ( rc )
00140       if (errsv != ENOENT)
00141         Return( posix2fsal_error(errsv), errsv, INDEX_FSAL_rename );
00142     else if ( new_parent_buffstat.st_uid != p_context->credential.user 
00143                 && buffstat.st_uid != p_context->credential.user 
00144                 && p_context->credential.user != 0 )
00145       Return(ERR_FSAL_ACCESS, 0, INDEX_FSAL_rename);
00146   }
00147   /*************************************
00148    * Rename the file on the filesystem *
00149    *************************************/
00150   TakeTokenFSCall();
00151   rc = rename( old_fsalpath.path, new_fsalpath.path );
00152   errsv = errno;
00153   ReleaseTokenFSCall();
00154   
00155   if (rc) Return( posix2fsal_error(errsv), errsv, INDEX_FSAL_rename );
00156  
00157   /***********************************
00158    * Rename the file in the database *
00159    ***********************************/
00160   statusdb = fsal_posixdb_replace( p_context->p_conn, 
00161                                    &info, 
00162                                    p_old_parentdir_handle, 
00163                                    p_old_name, 
00164                                    p_new_parentdir_handle, 
00165                                    p_new_name);
00166   
00167   switch (statusdb.major) {
00168     case ERR_FSAL_POSIXDB_NOENT:
00169     case ERR_FSAL_POSIXDB_NOERR:
00170       break;
00171     default:
00172       if ( FSAL_IS_ERROR(status = posixdb2fsal_error(statusdb)) ) Return( status.major, status.minor, INDEX_FSAL_rename);
00173   }
00174   
00175   /***********************
00176    * Fill the attributes *
00177    ***********************/
00178   
00179   if( p_src_dir_attributes ){
00180 
00181     status = FSAL_getattrs( p_old_parentdir_handle, p_context, p_src_dir_attributes );
00182     
00183     if ( FSAL_IS_ERROR( status ) )
00184     {
00185       FSAL_CLEAR_MASK( p_src_dir_attributes->asked_attributes );
00186       FSAL_SET_MASK( p_src_dir_attributes->asked_attributes,
00187           FSAL_ATTR_RDATTR_ERR );
00188     }
00189 
00190   }
00191   
00192   if( p_tgt_dir_attributes ){
00193     
00194     status = FSAL_getattrs( p_new_parentdir_handle, p_context, p_tgt_dir_attributes );
00195     
00196     if ( FSAL_IS_ERROR( status ) )
00197     {
00198       FSAL_CLEAR_MASK( p_tgt_dir_attributes->asked_attributes );
00199       FSAL_SET_MASK( p_tgt_dir_attributes->asked_attributes,
00200           FSAL_ATTR_RDATTR_ERR );
00201     }
00202       
00203   }
00204     
00205   /* OK */
00206   Return(ERR_FSAL_NO_ERROR ,0 , INDEX_FSAL_rename);
00207   
00208 }
